item.title: Public right of way (staircase) full of litter and leaves, not accessible, 28th September
item.description:
As you can see from the photo this staircase, which provides essential access, is full of rubbish and a large volume of leaves. These obstacles make it dangerous and not accessible. It doesn't look like it's been cleared by the council for years. This is unacceptable for the people living in the housing next to the staircase, their visitors and carers, to pass safely

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead Common Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 28th September
item.description:
This is the third time this size deposit of dog faeces has appeared on the same part of pavement outside my house. I would appreciate it it being swept up. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colne Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Household waste dumped next to housing, rubbish from bins strewn down the road, 28th September
item.description:
Broken disused children's toys including a large plastic playset have been abandoned in this housing estate which I am surprised isn't infested with rats. There is (often) rubbish from the bins strewn all over the road as you can see from the photos. This is not acceptable for the residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cantwell Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is in front of 95, Fernhead Road., 28th September
item.description:
Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is in front of 93, 95 Fernhead Road. The fouling starts on the corner of Fernhead Road and Fordingley Road. It's near the brick wall that's directly in front of 93 Fernhead Road and goes around the corner and some of it is at the entrance to 95 Fernhead Road. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
